entry.title: Jon rotation
entry.content: Jon Golan, a Phd student in the Genetics and Genomics program, started his rotation in our lab!
entry.summary: Jon Golan, a Phd student in the Genetics and Genomics program, started his rotation in our lab!

entry.title: First graduate student
entry.content: Mengting Li from Northeastern University joined us as the first graduate student. She is the wet-lab expert in our lab!
entry.summary: Mengting Li from Northeastern University joined us as the first graduate student. She is the wet-lab expert in our lab!

entry.title: New postdoc
entry.content: Dr. Wenqiang Xu joined EvoCatalysis@UF! He graduated from Peking University.
entry.summary: Dr. Wenqiang Xu joined EvoCatalysis@UF! He graduated from Peking University.

entry.title: Awards for two undergraduate students
entry.content: Two undergraduate students (Leif and Audrey) co-supervised by Dr. Jing Pan’s lab were accepted to University Scholar Program. Congrats!
entry.summary: Two undergraduate students (Leif and Audrey) co-supervised by Dr. Jing Pan’s lab were accepted to University Scholar Program. Congrats!

entry.title: First postdoc
entry.content: Dr. Wenqiang Cui joined EvoCatalysis@UF! He graduated from Chinese Academy of Sciences (Shenzhen).
entry.summary: Dr. Wenqiang Cui joined EvoCatalysis@UF! He graduated from Chinese Academy of Sciences (Shenzhen).

entry.title: First papers
entry.content: Our paper on luciferase has been accepted by PNAS. Our review paper on ‘evolutionary catalysis’ has been accepted in National Science Review.
entry.summary: Our paper on luciferase has been accepted by PNAS. Our review paper on ‘evolutionary catalysis’ has been accepted in National Science Review.

entry.title: First talks
entry.content: Dr. Xie gave talks at UF Department of Chemistry and Genetics Institute.
entry.summary: Dr. Xie gave talks at UF Department of Chemistry and Genetics Institute.

entry.title: Founding members
entry.content: Leif Holmstrom (Microbiology and Cell Science) and Kevin Fernandez (Chemical Engineering) joined the group as undergraduate researchers. Dr. Heba Agha joined the group as research assistant.
entry.summary: Leif Holmstrom (Microbiology and Cell Science) and Kevin Fernandez (Chemical Engineering) joined the group as undergraduate researchers. Dr. Heba Agha joined the group as research assistant.

entry.title: New affiliations
entry.content: Dr. Xie is now officially affiliated with the Genetics Institute and the UF Health Cancer Center.
entry.summary: Dr. Xie is now officially affiliated with the Genetics Institute and the UF Health Cancer Center.

entry.title: First day
entry.content: The EvoCatalysis lab is now officially open! We express our gratitude for the support from the College of Pharmacy and the Genetics Institute at UF.
entry.summary: The EvoCatalysis lab is now officially open! We express our gratitude for the support from the College of Pharmacy and the Genetics Institute at UF.
